manzils.text: sub'hana alladhi asra biʿabdihi laylan mina l-masjidi l-harami ila l-masjidi l-aqsa alladhi barakna hawlahu linuriyahu min ayatina innahu huwa l-samiʿu l-basiru
waatayna musa l-kitaba wajaʿalnahu hudan libani is'raila alla tattakhidhu min duni wakilan
dhurriyyata man hamalna maʿa nuhin innahu kana ʿabdan shakuran
waqadayna ila bani is'raila fi l-kitabi latuf'sidunna fi l-ardi marratayni walataʿlunna ʿuluwwan kabiran
fa-idha jaa waʿdu ulahuma baʿathna ʿalaykum ʿibadan lana uli basin shadidin fajasu khilala l-diyari wakana waʿdan mafʿulan
thumma radadna lakumu l-karata ʿalayhim wa-amdadnakum bi-amwalin wabanina wajaʿalnakum akthara nafiran
in ahsantum ahsantum li-anfusikum wa-in asatum falaha fa-idha jaa waʿdu l-akhirati liyasuu wujuhakum waliyadkhulu l-masjida kama dakhaluhu awwala marratin waliyutabbiru ma ʿalaw tatbiran
ʿasa rabbukum an yarhamakum wa-in ʿudttum ʿud'na wajaʿalna jahannama lil'kafirina hasiran
inna hadha l-qur'ana yahdi lillati hiya aqwamu wayubashiru l-mu'minina alladhina yaʿmaluna l-salihati anna lahum ajran kabiran
wa-anna alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati aʿtadna lahum ʿadhaban aliman
wayadʿu l-insanu bil-shari duʿaahu bil-khayri wakana l-insanu ʿajulan

wajaʿalna al-layla wal-nahara ayatayni famahawna ayata al-layli wajaʿalna ayata l-nahari mub'siratan litabtaghu fadlan min rabbikum walitaʿlamu ʿadada l-sinina wal-hisaba wakulla shayin fassalnahu tafsilan
wakulla insanin alzamnahu tairahu fi ʿunuqihi wanukh'riju lahu yawma l-qiyamati kitaban yalqahu manshuran
iq'ra kitabaka kafa binafsika l-yawma ʿalayka hasiban
mani ih'tada fa-innama yahtadi linafsihi waman dalla fa-innama yadillu ʿalayha wala taziru waziratun wiz'ra ukh'ra wama kunna muʿadhibina hatta nabʿatha rasulan
wa-idha aradna an nuh'lika qaryatan amarna mut'rafiha fafasaqu fiha fahaqqa ʿalayha l-qawlu fadammarnaha tadmiran
wakam ahlakna mina l-quruni min baʿdi nuhin wakafa birabbika bidhunubi ʿibadihi khabiran basiran
man kana yuridu l-ʿajilata ʿajjalna lahu fiha ma nashau liman nuridu thumma jaʿalna lahu jahannama yaslaha madhmuman madhuran
waman arada l-akhirata wasaʿa laha saʿyaha wahuwa mu'minun fa-ulaika kana saʿyuhum mashkuran
kullan numiddu haulai wahaulai min ʿatai rabbika wama kana ʿatau rabbika mahzuran
unzur kayfa faddalna baʿdahum ʿala baʿdin walalakhiratu akbaru darajatin wa-akbaru tafdilan
la tajʿal maʿa l-lahi ilahan akhara fataqʿuda madhmuman makhdhulan
waqada rabbuka alla taʿbudu illa iyyahu wabil-walidayni ih'sanan imma yablughanna ʿindaka l-kibara ahaduhuma aw kilahuma fala taqul lahuma uffin wala tanharhuma waqul lahuma qawlan kariman
wa-ikh'fid lahuma janaha l-dhuli mina l-rahmati waqul rabbi ir'hamhuma kama rabbayani saghiran
rabbukum aʿlamu bima fi nufusikum in takunu salihina fa-innahu kana lil'awwabina ghafuran
waati dha l-qur'ba haqqahu wal-mis'kina wa-ib'na l-sabili wala tubadhir tabdhiran
inna l-mubadhirina kanu ikh'wana l-shayatini wakana l-shaytanu lirabbihi kafuran
wa-imma tuʿ'ridanna ʿanhumu ib'tighaa rahmatin min rabbika tarjuha faqul lahum qawlan maysuran
wala tajʿal yadaka maghlulatan ila ʿunuqika wala tabsut'ha kulla l-basti fataqʿuda maluman mahsuran
inna rabbaka yabsutu l-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru innahu kana biʿibadihi khabiran basiran
wala taqtulu awladakum khashyata im'laqin nahnu narzuquhum wa-iyyakum inna qatlahum kana khit'an kabiran
wala taqrabu l-zina innahu kana fahishatan wasaa sabilan
wala taqtulu l-nafsa allati harrama l-lahu illa bil-haqi waman qutila mazluman faqad jaʿalna liwaliyyihi sul'tanan fala yus'rif fi l-qatli innahu kana mansuran
wala taqrabu mala l-yatimi illa bi-allati hiya ahsanu hatta yablugha ashuddahu wa-awfu bil-ʿahdi inna l-ʿahda kana masulan
wa-awfu l-kayla idha kil'tum wazinu bil-qis'tasi l-mus'taqimi dhalika khayrun wa-ahsanu tawilan
wala taqfu ma laysa laka bihi ʿil'mun inna l-samʿa wal-basara wal-fuada kullu ulaika kana ʿanhu masulan
wala tamshi fi l-ardi marahan innaka lan takhriqa l-arda walan tablugha l-jibala tulan
kullu dhalika kana sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makruhan
dhalika mimma awha ilayka rabbuka mina l-hik'mati wala tajʿal maʿa l-lahi ilahan akhara fatul'qa fi jahannama maluman madhuran
afa-asfakum rabbukum bil-banina wa-ittakhadha mina l-malaikati inathan innakum lataquluna qawlan ʿaziman
walaqad sarrafna fi hadha l-qur'ani liyadhakkaru wama yaziduhum illa nufuran
qul law kana maʿahu alihatun kama yaquluna idhan la-ib'taghaw ila dhi l-ʿarshi sabilan
sub'hanahu wataʿala ʿamma yaquluna ʿuluwwan kabiran
tusabbihu lahu l-samawatu l-sabʿu wal-ardu waman fihinna wa-in min shayin illa yusabbihu bihamdihi walakin la tafqahuna tasbihahum innahu kana haliman ghafuran
wa-idha qarata l-qur'ana jaʿalna baynaka wabayna alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati hijaban masturan
wajaʿalna ʿala qulubihim akinnatan an yafqahuhu wafi adhanihim waqran wa-idha dhakarta rabbaka fi l-qur'ani wahdahu wallaw ʿala adbarihim nufuran
nahnu aʿlamu bima yastamiʿuna bihi idh yastamiʿuna ilayka wa-idh hum najwa idh yaqulu l-zalimuna in tattabiʿuna illa rajulan mashuran
unzur kayfa darabu laka l-amthala fadallu fala yastatiʿuna sabilan
waqalu a-idha kunna ʿizaman warufatan a-inna lamabʿuthuna khalqan jadidan
qul kunu hijaratan aw hadidan
aw khalqan mimma yakburu fi sudurikum fasayaquluna man yuʿiduna quli alladhi fatarakum awwala marratin fasayun'ghiduna ilayka ruusahum wayaquluna mata huwa qul ʿasa an yakuna qariban
yawma yadʿukum fatastajibuna bihamdihi watazunnuna in labith'tum illa qalilan
waqul liʿibadi yaqulu allati hiya ahsanu inna l-shaytana yanzaghu baynahum inna l-shaytana kana lil'insani ʿaduwwan mubinan
rabbukum aʿlamu bikum in yasha yarhamkum aw in yasha yuʿadhib'kum wama arsalnaka ʿalayhim wakilan
warabbuka aʿlamu biman fi l-samawati wal-ardi walaqad faddalna baʿda l-nabiyina ʿala baʿdin waatayna dawuda zaburan
quli id'ʿu alladhina zaʿamtum min dunihi fala yamlikuna kashfa l-duri ʿankum wala tahwilan
ulaika alladhina yadʿuna yabtaghuna ila rabbihimu l-wasilata ayyuhum aqrabu wayarjuna rahmatahu wayakhafuna ʿadhabahu inna ʿadhaba rabbika kana mahdhuran
wa-in min qaryatin illa nahnu muh'likuha qabla yawmi l-qiyamati aw muʿadhibuha ʿadhaban shadidan kana dhalika fi l-kitabi masturan
wama manaʿana an nur'sila bil-ayati illa an kadhaba biha l-awaluna waatayna thamuda l-naqata mub'siratan fazalamu biha wama nur'silu bil-ayati illa takhwifan

wa-idh qul'na laka inna rabbaka ahata bil-nasi wama jaʿalna l-ru'ya allati araynaka illa fit'natan lilnnasi wal-shajarata l-malʿunata fi l-qur'ani wanukhawwifuhum fama yaziduhum illa tugh'yanan kabiran
wa-idh qul'na lil'malaikati us'judu liadama fasajadu illa ib'lisa qala a-asjudu liman khalaqta tinan
qala ara-aytaka hadha alladhi karramta ʿalayya la-in akhartani ila yawmi l-qiyamati la-ahtanikanna dhurriyyatahu illa qalilan
qala idh'hab faman tabiʿaka min'hum fa-inna jahannama jazaukum jazaan mawfuran
wa-is'tafziz mani is'tataʿta min'hum bisawtika wa-ajlib ʿalayhim bikhaylika warajilika washarik'hum fi l-amwali wal-awladi waʿid'hum wama yaʿiduhumu l-shaytanu illa ghururan
inna ʿibadi laysa laka ʿalayhim sul'tanun wakafa birabbika wakilan
rabbukumu alladhi yuz'ji lakumu l-ful'ka fi l-bahri litabtaghu min fadlihi innahu kana bikum rahiman
wa-idha massakumu l-duru fi l-bahri dalla man tadʿuna illa iyyahu falamma najjakum ila l-bari aʿradtum wakana l-insanu kafuran
afa-amintum an yakhsifa bikum janiba l-bari aw yur'sila ʿalaykum hasiban thumma la tajidu lakum wakilan
am amintum an yuʿidakum fihi taratan ukh'ra fayur'sila ʿalaykum qasifan mina l-rihi fayugh'riqakum bima kafartum thumma la tajidu lakum ʿalayna bihi tabiʿan
walaqad karramna bani adama wahamalnahum fi l-bari wal-bahri warazaqnahum mina l-tayibati wafaddalnahum ʿala kathirin mimman khalaqna tafdilan
yawma nadʿu kulla unasin bi-imamihim faman utiya kitabahu biyaminihi fa-ulaika yaqrauna kitabahum wala yuz'lamuna fatilan
waman kana fi hadhihi aʿma fahuwa fi l-akhirati aʿma wa-adallu sabilan
wa-in kadu layaftinunaka ʿani alladhi awhayna ilayka litaftariya ʿalayna ghayrahu wa-idhan la-ittakhadhuka khalilan
walawla an thabbatnaka laqad kidtta tarkanu ilayhim shayan qalilan
idhan la-adhaqnaka diʿ'fa l-hayati wadiʿ'fa l-mamati thumma la tajidu laka ʿalayna nasiran
wa-in kadu layastafizzunaka mina l-ardi liyukh'rijuka min'ha wa-idhan la yalbathuna khilafaka illa qalilan
sunnata man qad arsalna qablaka min rusulina wala tajidu lisunnatina tahwilan
aqimi l-salata liduluki l-shamsi ila ghasaqi al-layli waqur'ana l-fajri inna qur'ana l-fajri kana mashhudan
wamina al-layli fatahajjad bihi nafilatan laka ʿasa an yabʿathaka rabbuka maqaman mahmudan
waqul rabbi adkhil'ni mud'khala sid'qin wa-akhrij'ni mukh'raja sid'qin wa-ij'ʿal li min ladunka sul'tanan nasiran
waqul jaa l-haqu wazahaqa l-batilu inna l-batila kana zahuqan
wanunazzilu mina l-qur'ani ma huwa shifaon warahmatun lil'mu'minina wala yazidu l-zalimina illa khasaran
wa-idha anʿamna ʿala l-insani aʿrada wanaa bijanibihi wa-idha massahu l-sharu kana yausan
qul kullun yaʿmalu ʿala shakilatihi farabbukum aʿlamu biman huwa ahda sabilan
wayasalunaka ʿani l-ruhi quli l-ruhu min amri rabbi wama utitum mina l-ʿil'mi illa qalilan
wala-in shi'na lanadhhabanna bi-alladhi awhayna ilayka thumma la tajidu laka bihi ʿalayna wakilan
illa rahmatan min rabbika inna fadlahu kana ʿalayka kabiran
qul la-ini ij'tamaʿati l-insu wal-jinu ʿala an yatu bimith'li hadha l-qur'ani la yatuna bimith'lihi walaw kana baʿduhum libaʿdin zahiran
walaqad sarrafna lilnnasi fi hadha l-qur'ani min kulli mathalin fa-aba aktharu l-nasi illa kufuran
waqalu lan nu'mina laka hatta tafjura lana mina l-ardi yanbuʿan
aw takuna laka jannatun min nakhilin waʿinabin fatufajjira l-anhara khilalaha tafjiran
aw tus'qita l-samaa kama zaʿamta ʿalayna kisafan aw tatiya bil-lahi wal-malaikati qabilan
aw yakuna laka baytun min zukh'rufin aw tarqa fi l-samai walan nu'mina liruqiyyika hatta tunazzila ʿalayna kitaban naqra-uhu qul sub'hana rabbi hal kuntu illa basharan rasulan
wama manaʿa l-nasa an yu'minu idh jaahumu l-huda illa an qalu abaʿatha l-lahu basharan rasulan
qul law kana fi l-ardi malaikatun yamshuna mut'ma-innina lanazzalna ʿalayhim mina l-samai malakan rasulan
qul kafa bil-lahi shahidan bayni wabaynakum innahu kana biʿibadihi khabiran basiran

waman yahdi l-lahu fahuwa l-muh'tadi waman yud'lil falan tajida lahum awliyaa min dunihi wanahshuruhum yawma l-qiyamati ʿala wujuhihim ʿum'yan wabuk'man wasumman mawahum jahannamu kullama khabat zid'nahum saʿiran
dhalika jazauhum bi-annahum kafaru biayatina waqalu a-idha kunna ʿizaman warufatan a-inna lamabʿuthuna khalqan jadidan
awalam yaraw anna l-laha alladhi khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda qadirun ʿala an yakhluqa mith'lahum wajaʿala lahum ajalan la rayba fihi fa-aba l-zalimuna illa kufuran
qul law antum tamlikuna khazaina rahmati rabbi idhan la-amsaktum khashyata l-infaqi wakana l-insanu qaturan
walaqad atayna musa tis'ʿa ayatin bayyinatin fasal bani is'raila idh jaahum faqala lahu fir'ʿawnu inni la-azunnuka yamusa mashuran
qala laqad ʿalim'ta ma anzala haulai illa rabbu l-samawati wal-ardi basaira wa-inni la-azunnuka yafir'ʿawnu mathburan
fa-arada an yastafizzahum mina l-ardi fa-aghraqnahu waman maʿahu jamiʿan
waqul'na min baʿdihi libani is'raila us'kunu l-arda fa-idha jaa waʿdu l-akhirati ji'na bikum lafifan
wabil-haqi anzalnahu wabil-haqi nazala wama arsalnaka illa mubashiran wanadhiran
waqur'anan faraqnahu litaqra-ahu ʿala l-nasi ʿala muk'thin wanazzalnahu tanzilan
qul aminu bihi aw la tu'minu inna alladhina utu l-ʿil'ma min qablihi idha yut'la ʿalayhim yakhirruna lil'adhqani sujjadan
wayaquluna sub'hana rabbina in kana waʿdu rabbina lamafʿulan
wayakhirruna lil'adhqani yabkuna wayaziduhum khushuʿan
quli id'ʿu l-laha awi id'ʿu l-rahmana ayyan ma tadʿu falahu l-asmau l-hus'na wala tajhar bisalatika wala tukhafit biha wa-ib'taghi bayna dhalika sabilan
waquli l-hamdu lillahi alladhi lam yattakhidh waladan walam yakun lahu sharikun fi l-mul'ki walam yakun lahu waliyyun mina l-dhuli wakabbir'hu takbiran
al-hamdu lillahi alladhi anzala ʿala ʿabdihi l-kitaba walam yajʿal lahu ʿiwaja
qayyiman liyundhira basan shadidan min ladun'hu wayubashira l-mu'minina alladhina yaʿmaluna l-salihati anna lahum ajran hasanan
makithina fihi abadan
wayundhira alladhina qalu ittakhadha l-lahu waladan
ma lahum bihi min ʿil'min wala liabaihim kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwahihim in yaquluna illa kadhiban
falaʿallaka bakhiʿun nafsaka ʿala atharihim in lam yu'minu bihadha l-hadithi asafan
inna jaʿalna ma ʿala l-ardi zinatan laha linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu ʿamalan
wa-inna lajaʿiluna ma ʿalayha saʿidan juruzan
am hasib'ta anna ashaba l-kahfi wal-raqimi kanu min ayatina ʿajaban
idh awa l-fit'yatu ila l-kahfi faqalu rabbana atina min ladunka rahmatan wahayyi lana min amrina rashadan
fadarabna ʿala adhanihim fi l-kahfi sinina ʿadadan
thumma baʿathnahum linaʿlama ayyu l-hiz'bayni ahsa lima labithu amadan
nahnu naqussu ʿalayka naba-ahum bil-haqi innahum fit'yatun amanu birabbihim wazid'nahum hudan
warabatna ʿala qulubihim idh qamu faqalu rabbuna rabbu l-samawati wal-ardi lan nadʿuwa min dunihi ilahan laqad qul'na idhan shatatan
haulai qawmuna ittakhadhu min dunihi alihatan lawla yatuna ʿalayhim bisul'tanin bayyinin faman azlamu mimmani if'tara ʿala l-lahi kadhiban
wa-idhi iʿ'tazaltumuhum wama yaʿbuduna illa l-laha fawu ila l-kahfi yanshur lakum rabbukum min rahmatihi wayuhayyi lakum min amrikum mir'faqan

watara l-shamsa idha talaʿat tazawaru ʿan kahfihim dhata l-yamini wa-idha gharabat taqriduhum dhata l-shimali wahum fi fajwatin min'hu dhalika min ayati l-lahi man yahdi l-lahu fahuwa l-muh'tadi waman yud'lil falan tajida lahu waliyyan mur'shidan

watahsabuhum ayqazan wahum ruqudun wanuqallibuhum dhata l-yamini wadhata l-shimali wakalbuhum basitun dhiraʿayhi bil-wasidi lawi ittalaʿta ʿalayhim lawallayta min'hum firaran walamuli'ta min'hum ruʿ'ban

wakadhalika baʿathnahum liyatasaalu baynahum qala qailun min'hum kam labith'tum qalu labith'na yawman aw baʿda yawmin qalu rabbukum aʿlamu bima labith'tum fa-ib'ʿathu ahadakum biwariqikum hadhihi ila l-madinati falyanzur ayyuha azka taʿaman falyatikum biriz'qin min'hu walyatalattaf wala yush'ʿiranna bikum ahadan
innahum in yazharu ʿalaykum yarjumukum aw yuʿidukum fi millatihim walan tuf'lihu idhan abadan

wakadhalika aʿtharna ʿalayhim liyaʿlamu anna waʿda l-lahi haqqun wa-anna l-saʿata la rayba fiha idh yatanazaʿuna baynahum amrahum faqalu ib'nu ʿalayhim bun'yanan rabbuhum aʿlamu bihim qala alladhina ghalabu ʿala amrihim lanattakhidhanna ʿalayhim masjidan

sayaquluna thalathatun rabiʿuhum kalbuhum wayaquluna khamsatun sadisuhum kalbuhum rajman bil-ghaybi wayaquluna sabʿatun wathaminuhum kalbuhum qul rabbi aʿlamu biʿiddatihim ma yaʿlamuhum illa qalilun fala tumari fihim illa miraan zahiran wala tastafti fihim min'hum ahadan
wala taqulanna lishay'in inni faʿilun dhalika ghadan
illa an yashaa l-lahu wa-udh'kur rabbaka idha nasita waqul ʿasa an yahdiyani rabbi li-aqraba min hadha rashadan
walabithu fi kahfihim thalatha mi-atin sinina wa-iz'dadu tis'ʿan
quli l-lahu aʿlamu bima labithu lahu ghaybu l-samawati wal-ardi absir bihi wa-asmiʿ ma lahum min dunihi min waliyyin wala yush'riku fi huk'mihi ahadan
wa-ut'lu ma uhiya ilayka min kitabi rabbika la mubaddila likalimatihi walan tajida min dunihi mul'tahadan

wa-is'bir nafsaka maʿa alladhina yadʿuna rabbahum bil-ghadati wal-ʿashiyi yuriduna wajhahu wala taʿdu ʿaynaka ʿanhum turidu zinata l-hayati l-dun'ya wala tutiʿ man aghfalna qalbahu ʿan dhik'rina wa-ittabaʿa hawahu wakana amruhu furutan

waquli l-haqu min rabbikum faman shaa falyu'min waman shaa falyakfur inna aʿtadna lilzzalimina naran ahata bihim suradiquha wa-in yastaghithu yughathu bimain kal-muh'li yashwi l-wujuha bi'sa l-sharabu wasaat mur'tafaqan
inna alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati inna la nudiʿu ajra man ahsana ʿamalan

ulaika lahum jannatu ʿadnin tajri min tahtihimu l-anharu yuhallawna fiha min asawira min dhahabin wayalbasuna thiyaban khud'ran min sundusin wa-is'tabraqin muttakiina fiha ʿala l-araiki niʿ'ma l-thawabu wahasunat mur'tafaqan
wa-id'rib lahum mathalan rajulayni jaʿalna li-ahadihima jannatayni min aʿnabin wahafafnahuma binakhlin wajaʿalna baynahuma zarʿan
kil'ta l-janatayni atat ukulaha walam tazlim min'hu shayan wafajjarna khilalahuma naharan
wakana lahu thamarun faqala lisahibihi wahuwa yuhawiruhu ana aktharu minka malan wa-aʿazzu nafaran
wadakhala jannatahu wahuwa zalimun linafsihi qala ma azunnu an tabida hadhihi abadan
wama azunnu l-saʿata qaimatan wala-in rudidttu ila rabbi la-ajidanna khayran min'ha munqalaban
qala lahu sahibuhu wahuwa yuhawiruhu akafarta bi-alladhi khalaqaka min turabin thumma min nut'fatin thumma sawwaka rajulan
lakinna huwa l-lahu rabbi wala ush'riku birabbi ahadan
walawla idh dakhalta jannataka qul'ta ma shaa l-lahu la quwwata illa bil-lahi in tarani ana aqalla minka malan wawaladan
faʿasa rabbi an yu'tiyani khayran min jannatika wayur'sila ʿalayha hus'banan mina l-samai fatus'biha saʿidan zalaqan
aw yus'biha mauha ghawran falan tastatiʿa lahu talaban
wa-uhita bithamarihi fa-asbaha yuqallibu kaffayhi ʿala ma anfaqa fiha wahiya khawiyatun ʿala ʿurushiha wayaqulu yalaytani lam ush'rik birabbi ahadan
walam takun lahu fi-atun yansurunahu min duni l-lahi wama kana muntasiran
hunalika l-walayatu lillahi l-haqi huwa khayrun thawaban wakhayrun ʿuq'ban
wa-id'rib lahum mathala l-hayati l-dun'ya kamain anzalnahu mina l-samai fa-ikh'talata bihi nabatu l-ardi fa-asbaha hashiman tadhruhu l-riyahu wakana l-lahu ʿala kulli shayin muq'tadiran

waqul rabbi igh'fir wa-ir'ham wa-anta khayru l-rahimina
suratun anzalnaha wafaradnaha wa-anzalna fiha ayatin bayyinatin laʿallakum tadhakkaruna

al-zaniyatu wal-zani fa-ij'lidu kulla wahidin min'huma mi-ata jaldatin wala takhudh'kum bihima rafatun fi dini l-lahi in kuntum tu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi l-akhiri walyashhad ʿadhabahuma taifatun mina l-mu'minina
al-zani la yankihu illa zaniyatan aw mush'rikatan wal-zaniyatu la yankihuha illa zanin aw mush'rikun wahurrima dhalika ʿala l-mu'minina
wa-alladhina yarmuna l-muh'sanati thumma lam yatu bi-arbaʿati shuhadaa fa-ij'liduhum thamanina jaldatan wala taqbalu lahum shahadatan abadan wa-ulaika humu l-fasiquna
illa alladhina tabu min baʿdi dhalika wa-aslahu fa-inna l-laha ghafurun rahimun
wa-alladhina yarmuna azwajahum walam yakun lahum shuhadau illa anfusuhum fashahadatu ahadihim arbaʿu shahadatin bil-lahi innahu lamina l-sadiqina
wal-khamisatu anna laʿnata l-lahi ʿalayhi in kana mina l-kadhibina
wayadra-u ʿanha l-ʿadhaba an tashhada arbaʿa shahadatin bil-lahi innahu lamina l-kadhibina
wal-khamisata anna ghadaba l-lahi ʿalayha in kana mina l-sadiqina
walawla fadlu l-lahi ʿalaykum warahmatuhu wa-anna l-laha tawwabun hakimun

inna alladhina jau bil-if'ki ʿus'batun minkum la tahsabuhu sharran lakum bal huwa khayrun lakum likulli im'ri-in min'hum ma ik'tasaba mina l-ith'mi wa-alladhi tawalla kib'rahu min'hum lahu ʿadhabun ʿazimun
lawla idh samiʿ'tumuhu zanna l-mu'minuna wal-mu'minatu bi-anfusihim khayran waqalu hadha if'kun mubinun
lawla jau ʿalayhi bi-arbaʿati shuhadaa fa-idh lam yatu bil-shuhadai fa-ulaika ʿinda l-lahi humu l-kadhibuna
walawla fadlu l-lahi ʿalaykum warahmatuhu fi l-dun'ya wal-akhirati lamassakum fi ma afadtum fihi ʿadhabun ʿazimun
idh talaqqawnahu bi-alsinatikum wataquluna bi-afwahikum ma laysa lakum bihi ʿil'mun watahsabunahu hayyinan wahuwa ʿinda l-lahi ʿazimun
walawla idh samiʿ'tumuhu qul'tum ma yakunu lana an natakallama bihadha sub'hanaka hadha buh'tanun ʿazimun
yaʿizukumu l-lahu an taʿudu limith'lihi abadan in kuntum mu'minina
wayubayyinu l-lahu lakumu l-ayati wal-lahu ʿalimun hakimun
inna alladhina yuhibbuna an tashiʿa l-fahishatu fi alladhina amanu lahum ʿadhabun alimun fi l-dun'ya wal-akhirati wal-lahu yaʿlamu wa-antum la taʿlamuna
walawla fadlu l-lahi ʿalaykum warahmatuhu wa-anna l-laha raufun rahimun

yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattabiʿu khutuwati l-shaytani waman yattabiʿ khutuwati l-shaytani fa-innahu yamuru bil-fahshai wal-munkari walawla fadlu l-lahi ʿalaykum warahmatuhu ma zaka minkum min ahadin abadan walakinna l-laha yuzakki man yashau wal-lahu samiʿun ʿalimun
wala yatali ulu l-fadli minkum wal-saʿati an yu'tu uli l-qur'ba wal-masakina wal-muhajirina fi sabili l-lahi walyaʿfu walyasfahu ala tuhibbuna an yaghfira l-lahu lakum wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
inna alladhina yarmuna l-muh'sanati l-ghafilati l-mu'minati luʿinu fi l-dun'ya wal-akhirati walahum ʿadhabun ʿazimun
yawma tashhadu ʿalayhim alsinatuhum wa-aydihim wa-arjuluhum bima kanu yaʿmaluna
yawma-idhin yuwaffihimu l-lahu dinahumu l-haqa wayaʿlamuna anna l-laha huwa l-haqu l-mubinu
al-khabithatu lil'khabithina wal-khabithuna lil'khabithati wal-tayibatu lilttayyibina wal-tayibuna lilttayyibati ulaika mubarrauna mimma yaquluna lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karimun
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tadkhulu buyutan ghayra buyutikum hatta tastanisu watusallimu ʿala ahliha dhalikum khayrun lakum laʿallakum tadhakkaruna
fa-in lam tajidu fiha ahadan fala tadkhuluha hatta yu'dhana lakum wa-in qila lakumu ir'jiʿu fa-ir'jiʿu huwa azka lakum wal-lahu bima taʿmaluna ʿalimun
laysa ʿalaykum junahun an tadkhulu buyutan ghayra maskunatin fiha mataʿun lakum wal-lahu yaʿlamu ma tub'duna wama taktumuna
qul lil'mu'minina yaghuddu min absarihim wayahfazu furujahum dhalika azka lahum inna l-laha khabirun bima yasnaʿuna

waqul lil'mu'minati yaghdud'na min absarihinna wayahfazna furujahunna wala yub'dina zinatahunna illa ma zahara min'ha walyadrib'na bikhumurihinna ʿala juyubihinna wala yub'dina zinatahunna illa libuʿulatihinna aw abaihinna aw abai buʿulatihinna aw abnaihinna aw abnai buʿulatihinna aw ikh'wanihinna aw bani ikh'wanihinna aw bani akhawatihinna aw nisaihinna aw ma malakat aymanuhunna awi l-tabiʿina ghayri uli l-ir'bati mina l-rijali awi l-tif'li alladhina lam yazharu ʿala ʿawrati l-nisai wala yadrib'na bi-arjulihinna liyuʿ'lama ma yukh'fina min zinatihinna watubu ila l-lahi jamiʿan ayyuha l-mu'minuna laʿallakum tuf'lihuna
wa-ankihu l-ayama minkum wal-salihina min ʿibadikum wa-imaikum in yakunu fuqaraa yugh'nihimu l-lahu min fadlihi wal-lahu wasiʿun ʿalimun

walyastaʿfifi alladhina la yajiduna nikahan hatta yugh'niyahumu l-lahu min fadlihi wa-alladhina yabtaghuna l-kitaba mimma malakat aymanukum fakatibuhum in ʿalim'tum fihim khayran waatuhum min mali l-lahi alladhi atakum wala tuk'rihu fatayatikum ʿala l-bighai in aradna tahassunan litabtaghu ʿarada l-hayati l-dun'ya waman yuk'rihhunna fa-inna l-laha min baʿdi ik'rahihinna ghafurun rahimun
walaqad anzalna ilaykum ayatin mubayyinatin wamathalan mina alladhina khalaw min qablikum wamawʿizatan lil'muttaqina

al-lahu nuru l-samawati wal-ardi mathalu nurihi kamish'katin fiha mis'bahun l-mis'bahu fi zujajatin l-zujajatu ka-annaha kawkabun durriyyun yuqadu min shajaratin mubarakatin zaytunatin la sharqiyyatin wala gharbiyyatin yakadu zaytuha yudiu walaw lam tamsashu narun nurun ʿala nurin yahdi l-lahu linurihi man yashau wayadribu l-lahu l-amthala lilnnasi wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalimun
fi buyutin adhina l-lahu an tur'faʿa wayudh'kara fiha us'muhu yusabbihu lahu fiha bil-ghuduwi wal-asali
rijalun la tul'hihim tijaratun wala bayʿun ʿan dhik'ri l-lahi wa-iqami l-salati waitai l-zakati yakhafuna yawman tataqallabu fihi l-qulubu wal-absaru
liyajziyahumu l-lahu ahsana ma ʿamilu wayazidahum min fadlihi wal-lahu yarzuqu man yashau bighayri hisabin
wa-alladhina kafaru aʿmaluhum kasarabin biqiʿatin yahsabuhu l-zamanu maan hatta idha jaahu lam yajid'hu shayan wawajada l-laha ʿindahu fawaffahu hisabahu wal-lahu sariʿu l-hisabi

aw kazulumatin fi bahrin lujjiyyin yaghshahu mawjun min fawqihi mawjun min fawqihi sahabun zulumatun baʿduha fawqa baʿdin idha akhraja yadahu lam yakad yaraha waman lam yajʿali l-lahu lahu nuran fama lahu min nurin
alam tara anna l-laha yusabbihu lahu man fi l-samawati wal-ardi wal-tayru saffatin kullun qad ʿalima salatahu watasbihahu wal-lahu ʿalimun bima yafʿaluna
walillahi mul'ku l-samawati wal-ardi wa-ila l-lahi l-masiru

alam tara anna l-laha yuz'ji sahaban thumma yu-allifu baynahu thumma yajʿaluhu rukaman fatara l-wadqa yakhruju min khilalihi wayunazzilu mina l-samai min jibalin fiha min baradin fayusibu bihi man yashau wayasrifuhu ʿan man yashau yakadu sana barqihi yadhhabu bil-absari
yuqallibu l-lahu al-layla wal-nahara inna fi dhalika laʿib'ratan li-uli l-absari

wal-lahu khalaqa kulla dabbatin min main famin'hum man yamshi ʿala batnihi wamin'hum man yamshi ʿala rij'layni wamin'hum man yamshi ʿala arbaʿin yakhluqu l-lahu ma yashau inna l-laha ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
laqad anzalna ayatin mubayyinatin wal-lahu yahdi man yashau ila siratin mus'taqimin
wayaquluna amanna bil-lahi wabil-rasuli wa-ataʿna thumma yatawalla fariqun min'hum min baʿdi dhalika wama ulaika bil-mu'minina
wa-idha duʿu ila l-lahi warasulihi liyahkuma baynahum idha fariqun min'hum muʿ'riduna
wa-in yakun lahumu l-haqu yatu ilayhi mudh'ʿinina
afi qulubihim maradun ami ir'tabu am yakhafuna an yahifa l-lahu ʿalayhim warasuluhu bal ulaika humu l-zalimuna
innama kana qawla l-mu'minina idha duʿu ila l-lahi warasulihi liyahkuma baynahum an yaqulu samiʿ'na wa-ataʿna wa-ulaika humu l-muf'lihuna
waman yutiʿi l-laha warasulahu wayakhsha l-laha wayattaqhi fa-ulaika humu l-faizuna
wa-aqsamu bil-lahi jahda aymanihim la-in amartahum layakhrujunna qul la tuq'simu taʿatun maʿrufatun inna l-laha khabirun bima taʿmaluna
qul atiʿu l-laha wa-atiʿu l-rasula fa-in tawallaw fa-innama ʿalayhi ma hummila waʿalaykum ma hummil'tum wa-in tutiʿuhu tahtadu wama ʿala l-rasuli illa l-balaghu l-mubinu

waʿada l-lahu alladhina amanu minkum waʿamilu l-salihati layastakhlifannahum fi l-ardi kama is'takhlafa alladhina min qablihim walayumakkinanna lahum dinahumu alladhi ir'tada lahum walayubaddilannahum min baʿdi khawfihim amnan yaʿbudunani la yush'rikuna bi shayan waman kafara baʿda dhalika fa-ulaika humu l-fasiquna
wa-aqimu l-salata waatu l-zakata wa-atiʿu l-rasula laʿallakum tur'hamuna
la tahsabanna alladhina kafaru muʿ'jizina fi l-ardi wamawahumu l-naru walabi'sa l-masiru

yaayyuha alladhina amanu liyastadhinkumu alladhina malakat aymanukum wa-alladhina lam yablughu l-huluma minkum thalatha marratin min qabli salati l-fajri wahina tadaʿuna thiyabakum mina l-zahirati wamin baʿdi salati l-ʿishai thalathu ʿawratin lakum laysa ʿalaykum wala ʿalayhim junahun baʿdahunna tawwafuna ʿalaykum baʿdukum ʿala baʿdin kadhalika yubayyinu l-lahu lakumu l-ayati wal-lahu ʿalimun hakimun
wa-idha balagha l-atfalu minkumu l-huluma falyastadhinu kama is'tadhana alladhina min qablihim kadhalika yubayyinu l-lahu lakum ayatihi wal-lahu ʿalimun hakimun
wal-qawaʿidu mina l-nisai allati la yarjuna nikahan falaysa ʿalayhinna junahun an yadaʿna thiyabahunna ghayra mutabarrijatin bizinatin wa-an yastaʿfif'na khayrun lahunna wal-lahu samiʿun ʿalimun

laysa ʿala l-aʿma harajun wala ʿala l-aʿraji harajun wala ʿala l-maridi harajun wala ʿala anfusikum an takulu min buyutikum aw buyuti abaikum aw buyuti ummahatikum aw buyuti ikh'wanikum aw buyuti akhawatikum aw buyuti aʿmamikum aw buyuti ʿammatikum aw buyuti akhwalikum aw buyuti khalatikum aw ma malaktum mafatihahu aw sadiqikum laysa ʿalaykum junahun an takulu jamiʿan aw ashtatan fa-idha dakhaltum buyutan fasallimu ʿala anfusikum tahiyyatan min ʿindi l-lahi mubarakatan tayyibatan kadhalika yubayyinu l-lahu lakumu l-ayati laʿallakum taʿqiluna

innama l-mu'minuna alladhina amanu bil-lahi warasulihi wa-idha kanu maʿahu ʿala amrin jamiʿin lam yadhhabu hatta yastadhinuhu inna alladhina yastadhinunaka ulaika alladhina yu'minuna bil-lahi warasulihi fa-idha is'tadhanuka libaʿdi shanihim fadhan liman shi'ta min'hum wa-is'taghfir lahumu l-laha inna l-laha ghafurun rahimun

la tajʿalu duʿaa l-rasuli baynakum kaduʿai baʿdikum baʿdan qad yaʿlamu l-lahu alladhina yatasallaluna minkum liwadhan falyahdhari alladhina yukhalifuna ʿan amrihi an tusibahum fit'natun aw yusibahum ʿadhabun alimun
ala inna lillahi ma fi l-samawati wal-ardi qad yaʿlamu ma antum ʿalayhi wayawma yur'jaʿuna ilayhi fayunabbi-uhum bima ʿamilu wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalimun
tabaraka alladhi nazzala l-fur'qana ʿala ʿabdihi liyakuna lil'ʿalamina nadhiran
alladhi lahu mul'ku l-samawati wal-ardi walam yattakhidh waladan walam yakun lahu sharikun fi l-mul'ki wakhalaqa kulla shayin faqaddarahu taqdiran
wa-ittakhadhu min dunihi alihatan la yakhluquna shayan wahum yukh'laquna wala yamlikuna li-anfusihim darran wala nafʿan wala yamlikuna mawtan wala hayatan wala nushuran
waqala alladhina kafaru in hadha illa if'kun if'tarahu wa-aʿanahu ʿalayhi qawmun akharuna faqad jau zul'man wazuran
waqalu asatiru l-awalina ik'tatabaha fahiya tum'la ʿalayhi buk'ratan wa-asilan
qul anzalahu alladhi yaʿlamu l-sira fi l-samawati wal-ardi innahu kana ghafuran rahiman
waqalu mali hadha l-rasuli yakulu l-taʿama wayamshi fi l-aswaqi lawla unzila ilayhi malakun fayakuna maʿahu nadhiran
aw yul'qa ilayhi kanzun aw takunu lahu jannatun yakulu min'ha waqala l-zalimuna in tattabiʿuna illa rajulan mashuran
unzur kayfa darabu laka l-amthala fadallu fala yastatiʿuna sabilan
tabaraka alladhi in shaa jaʿala laka khayran min dhalika jannatin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu wayajʿal laka qusuran
bal kadhabu bil-saʿati wa-aʿtadna liman kadhaba bil-saʿati saʿiran
idha ra-athum min makanin baʿidin samiʿu laha taghayyuzan wazafiran
wa-idha ul'qu min'ha makanan dayyiqan muqarranina daʿaw hunalika thuburan
la tadʿu l-yawma thuburan wahidan wa-id'ʿu thuburan kathiran
qul adhalika khayrun am jannatu l-khul'di allati wuʿida l-mutaquna kanat lahum jazaan wamasiran
lahum fiha ma yashauna khalidina kana ʿala rabbika waʿdan masulan
wayawma yahshuruhum wama yaʿbuduna min duni l-lahi fayaqulu a-antum adlaltum ʿibadi haulai am hum dallu l-sabila
qalu sub'hanaka ma kana yanbaghi lana an nattakhidha min dunika min awliyaa walakin mattaʿtahum waabaahum hatta nasu l-dhik'ra wakanu qawman buran
faqad kadhabukum bima taquluna fama tastatiʿuna sarfan wala nasran waman yazlim minkum nudhiq'hu ʿadhaban kabiran
wama arsalna qablaka mina l-mur'salina illa innahum layakuluna l-taʿama wayamshuna fi l-aswaqi wajaʿalna baʿdakum libaʿdin fit'natan atasbiruna wakana rabbuka basiran
waqala alladhina la yarjuna liqaana lawla unzila ʿalayna l-malaikatu aw nara rabbana laqadi is'takbaru fi anfusihim waʿataw ʿutuwwan kabiran
yawma yarawna l-malaikata la bush'ra yawma-idhin lil'muj'rimina wayaquluna hij'ran mahjuran
waqadim'na ila ma ʿamilu min ʿamalin fajaʿalnahu habaan manthuran
ashabu l-janati yawma-idhin khayrun mus'taqarran wa-ahsanu maqilan
wayawma tashaqqaqu l-samau bil-ghamami wanuzzila l-malaikatu tanzilan
al-mul'ku yawma-idhin l-haqu lilrrahmani wakana yawman ʿala l-kafirina ʿasiran
wayawma yaʿaddu l-zalimu ʿala yadayhi yaqulu yalaytani ittakhadhtu maʿa l-rasuli sabilan
yawaylata laytani lam attakhidh fulanan khalilan
laqad adallani ʿani l-dhik'ri baʿda idh jaani wakana l-shaytanu lil'insani khadhulan
waqala l-rasulu yarabbi inna qawmi ittakhadhu hadha l-qur'ana mahjuran
wakadhalika jaʿalna likulli nabiyyin ʿaduwwan mina l-muj'rimina wakafa birabbika hadiyan wanasiran
waqala alladhina kafaru lawla nuzzila ʿalayhi l-qur'anu jum'latan wahidatan kadhalika linuthabbita bihi fuadaka warattalnahu tartilan
wala yatunaka bimathalin illa ji'naka bil-haqi wa-ahsana tafsiran
alladhina yuh'sharuna ʿala wujuhihim ila jahannama ulaika sharrun makanan wa-adallu sabilan
walaqad atayna musa l-kitaba wajaʿalna maʿahu akhahu haruna waziran
faqul'na idh'haba ila l-qawmi alladhina kadhabu biayatina fadammarnahum tadmiran
waqawma nuhin lamma kadhabu l-rusula aghraqnahum wajaʿalnahum lilnnasi ayatan wa-aʿtadna lilzzalimina ʿadhaban aliman
waʿadan wathamuda wa-ashaba l-rasi waqurunan bayna dhalika kathiran
wakullan darabna lahu l-amthala wakullan tabbarna tatbiran
walaqad ataw ʿala l-qaryati allati um'tirat matara l-sawi afalam yakunu yarawnaha bal kanu la yarjuna nushuran
wa-idha ra-awka in yattakhidhunaka illa huzuwan ahadha alladhi baʿatha l-lahu rasulan
in kada layudilluna ʿan alihatina lawla an sabarna ʿalayha wasawfa yaʿlamuna hina yarawna l-ʿadhaba man adallu sabilan
ara-ayta mani ittakhadha ilahahu hawahu afa-anta takunu ʿalayhi wakilan
am tahsabu anna aktharahum yasmaʿuna aw yaʿqiluna in hum illa kal-anʿami bal hum adallu sabilan
alam tara ila rabbika kayfa madda l-zila walaw shaa lajaʿalahu sakinan thumma jaʿalna l-shamsa ʿalayhi dalilan
thumma qabadnahu ilayna qabdan yasiran
wahuwa alladhi jaʿala lakumu al-layla libasan wal-nawma subatan wajaʿala l-nahara nushuran
wahuwa alladhi arsala l-riyaha bush'ran bayna yaday rahmatihi wa-anzalna mina l-samai maan tahuran
linuh'yiya bihi baldatan maytan wanus'qiyahu mimma khalaqna anʿaman wa-anasiyya kathiran
walaqad sarrafnahu baynahum liyadhakkaru fa-aba aktharu l-nasi illa kufuran
walaw shi'na labaʿathna fi kulli qaryatin nadhiran
fala tutiʿi l-kafirina wajahid'hum bihi jihadan kabiran
wahuwa alladhi maraja l-bahrayni hadha ʿadhbun furatun wahadha mil'hun ujajun wajaʿala baynahuma barzakhan wahij'ran mahjuran
wahuwa alladhi khalaqa mina l-mai basharan fajaʿalahu nasaban wasih'ran wakana rabbuka qadiran
wayaʿbuduna min duni l-lahi ma la yanfaʿuhum wala yadurruhum wakana l-kafiru ʿala rabbihi zahiran
wama arsalnaka illa mubashiran wanadhiran
qul ma asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin illa man shaa an yattakhidha ila rabbihi sabilan
watawakkal ʿala l-hayi alladhi la yamutu wasabbih bihamdihi wakafa bihi bidhunubi ʿibadihi khabiran
alladhi khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ʿala l-ʿarshi l-rahmanu fasal bihi khabiran
wa-idha qila lahumu us'judu lilrrahmani qalu wama l-rahmanu anasjudu lima tamuruna wazadahum nufuran
tabaraka alladhi jaʿala fi l-samai burujan wajaʿala fiha sirajan waqamaran muniran
wahuwa alladhi jaʿala al-layla wal-nahara khil'fatan liman arada an yadhakkara aw arada shukuran
waʿibadu l-rahmani alladhina yamshuna ʿala l-ardi hawnan wa-idha khatabahumu l-jahiluna qalu salaman
wa-alladhina yabituna lirabbihim sujjadan waqiyaman
wa-alladhina yaquluna rabbana is'rif ʿanna ʿadhaba jahannama inna ʿadhabaha kana gharaman
innaha saat mus'taqarran wamuqaman
wa-alladhina idha anfaqu lam yus'rifu walam yaqturu wakana bayna dhalika qawaman
wa-alladhina la yadʿuna maʿa l-lahi ilahan akhara wala yaqtuluna l-nafsa allati harrama l-lahu illa bil-haqi wala yaznuna waman yafʿal dhalika yalqa athaman
yudaʿaf lahu l-ʿadhabu yawma l-qiyamati wayakhlud fihi muhanan
illa man taba waamana waʿamila ʿamalan salihan fa-ulaika yubaddilu l-lahu sayyiatihim hasanatin wakana l-lahu ghafuran rahiman
waman taba waʿamila salihan fa-innahu yatubu ila l-lahi mataban
wa-alladhina la yashhaduna l-zura wa-idha marru bil-laghwi marru kiraman
wa-alladhina idha dhukkiru biayati rabbihim lam yakhirru ʿalayha summan waʿum'yanan
wa-alladhina yaquluna rabbana hab lana min azwajina wadhurriyyatina qurrata aʿyunin wa-ij'ʿalna lil'muttaqina imaman
